name: Cult Simulator (MaxieB, Leif-Eric)
description:
Mady by Leif-Eric  and Maxie
Background Music Theme by  Mattia Cupelli

You ever want to lead a cult? With this game your dream becomes true.
You start with a small amount of followers to become a mighty cult. For effective raise you have to split up your followers into four different rooms: Money, Recruitement, Protection and the glory Sanctuary.
Every room has different tasks and helps you to build up your cult:
Money: Your cult generates money with different methods.
Recruitement: Raises the followers that want to join your cult.
Protection: Not all people accepts your cult and your questionable machinations. You need protection for you and your cult.
Sanctuary: Pray or sacrifice your followers for the greater good and for glory occurences.

Every room, except the sanctaury, are upgradeable. With this upgrades the room-production gives you a buff, a permanent worker and more followers can work there.
The maximum of upgrades are two. To get a overview about the room and the upgrades LEFT-CLICK the desired room.

You can change the working place of the followers in this way:
LEFT-CLICK desired follower/worker, RIGHT-CLICK the desired room. If the room isn't full the workers moves automatically to the choosen room.

******************************************

All sound-effects were bought via humble bundle and are allowed to use.

Improvements / goals for the future:
